      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Creates a deep copy of this Board.
      Methods in model with parameters of type Board 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract int Player.determineMove(Board board)
      Determines the field for the next move.
      int HumanPlayer.determineMove(Board board)
      Asks the user to input the field where to place the next mark.

      Determines the move the Computer Player has to make.

      Determines the move for the Computer Player.

      Determines and returns the move for the Computer Player.
      void Player.makeMove(Board board)
      Makes a move on the board.
